ClassDesc: Defines an image. For a marker, it can be used to set the image of the marker icon. For a ground overlay, it can be used to set the image to place on the surface of the earth. To obtain a @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#BitmapDescriptor_E@ use the factory class @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#BitmapDescriptorFactory_E@. Example of setting the icon of a marker @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#BitmapDescriptor_E@.
